      public void deleteUpgradeInstanceDetails(UpgradeInstance upgradeInstance)
      Delete all details for an Upgrade Instance. Leave the UpgradeInstance to leave a record of the upgrade.
      Parameters:
      upgradeInstance - UpgradeInstance for which the details are to be deleted.

    • forceCancelIncrementalUpgrade

      public void forceCancelIncrementalUpgrade()
      Forcibly unlocks the main and rolling upgrade locks before canceling the most recent upgrade entry. Therefore, this method should be called only when any green servers are stopped.

    • cancelRollingUpgrade

      @Deprecated public void cancelRollingUpgrade()
      Deprecated.
      Use cancelIncrementalUpgrade() instead.
